Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Theodore:

Text.Language: <ere nak w~ pimarturoc: ,ere piswij n~genneoc: ,ere piaylovoroc: Yeo~dwroc pic~tratilat/c.
Hail to you O martyr: hail to the courageous hero: hail to the struggle bearer: Theodore the General.
